data.name: Manta Demo
data.detailed_description:
Scour the depths for ancient technology and use it to build a fleet of biomechanical warships and take down the Federation. Upgrade your Manta with powerful genetic upgrades. Dogfight with interceptors and submarines. Defend your fleet from bombers, corvettes and marauding DeepHunters. Take out that anti-ship cannon before it destroys your frigates- all in this one mission!

This also includes a tutorial mission to get you used to flying, fleet design, construction and command, as well as resource management.
data.about_the_game:
Scour the depths for ancient technology and use it to build a fleet of biomechanical warships and take down the Federation. Upgrade your Manta with powerful genetic upgrades. Dogfight with interceptors and submarines. Defend your fleet from bombers, corvettes and marauding DeepHunters. Take out that anti-ship cannon before it destroys your frigates- all in this one mission!

This also includes a tutorial mission to get you used to flying, fleet design, construction and command, as well as resource management.
data.short_description: This demo contains a the Scorpion Rift mission from Manta, as well as a tutorial mission to acquaint the player with flying the amphibious Manta biointerceptor, designing and building a fleet, and fleet command and resource management.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 930
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements still being developed
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements still being developed
